metadata.title: Tuesday, 26th September, 2023
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) what the progress, in percentage terms, on the construction of Paul Mushindo University in Chinsali District was, as of August, 2023; and
(b) when the project will be completed.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) why the construction of the following infrastructure in Chikankata District has stalled:
(i) district administration offices; (ii) police station; and (iii) police staff houses;
(c) what the cause of the delay in completing each project is; and
(d) what the cost of the outstanding works, on each project, is.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct an additional secondary school in Mandevu Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a link road connecting Zambezi West Parliamentary Constituency to Kalabo District via Mitete and Liuwa Constituencies;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and

(c) if there are no such plans, why. ORDER OF THE DAY 1 Thanks – His Excellency the President’s Address - Motion (13th September) - Resumption of Debate:  (Mr. Michelo, MP). ___________________________
